name: Work Project
description: A loyalty rewards program that used AWS serverless services including Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, and SQS. Some features include a product data parser, abuse prevention system, and an account deletion system which preserved account data but removed personal information. Refactored a monolithic infrastructure to microservices.

name: Data File Parser
description: A file parser application which uses a cron job to retrieve CSV data from a WebDav service to insert into a single-table designed DynamoDB table. It uses Node streams to mitigate the large data sets and AWS SQS to queue data into DynamoDB.

name: Internal Website
description: Worked on a team to develop a couple of internal tools using Vue/Nuxt, Express, and AWS Lambda.

name: Drupal Elasticsearch Module
description: A Custom Drupal module that uses elasticsearch to index a large internal social networking site.

name: Ginge
description: A personal project which is a simple PHP template engine with nested if statements, and for loops. Can add custom functions and utilized a simple cache.

name: Portfolio
description: This portfolio site. Built with NextJS, hosted on Vercel, and uses Github Actions.

name: Portfolio Backend
description: This portfolio's backend API. Built with Python, FastAPI, AWS Gateway, AWS Lambda, and uses Terraform.
